mckilla: Could be that kmplayer is better than VLC for you. Doesn't have the same following, and it's a bit harder to find on Windows- and Mac-machines than Linux-machines. But for anyone wondering: MPlayer is probably just as good as VLC, it's just that VLC is better known, and IMO has a better interface
